name: Associazione DonneinQuota
goal: To achieve a parity democracy and to end sexism in the media
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Culture, Education
euInitiatives:
Together with Chiennes de garde (France) and Object (U.K.) in 2013 we founded the coalition of feminist organizations called WECAMS (Women's European Coalition against Media Sexism) to lobby at the European Parliament against media sexism.
In particular, at the E.P. we met EASA (European Advertising Standard Alliance) to convince them to engage against sexism in advertisement as they are the federation of European self regulatory organizations. We even launched a petition on Change.org
